column1: Store is now... open.  Welcome

ARE YOU SCARED?!
That's good! 'Cause you're on... "Yes, I Was Scared!"

What is it?!
Never heard of cock Magic, or roosters.

Kyle.

You're a Journalist, right?
I understand that you hate Terrance and Phillip.
Well, what about I help you get rid of them once and for all?
Let's just say that I'm someone who can help you, if you help me.  Just call me your old pal, Saddam Hussein.
This is shop class.  My name is Mr. Adler. For the next week, rather than your normal schoolwork, you'll be learning how to make things. Now, does anybody know WHY you're in shop class?  Yes?
Welcome to home ec.  For the next week, you will be learning how to bake, sew, clean, and make things that are lacy and pretty.

Just get the towel and meet us at the gas station outside of town. Or else!

Tweek! This is Officer Daniels! Now, try and stay calm, but we believe an abductor is in your room!
Give it up, buddy! We've got ya surrounded! Okay, Tweek, I want you to very calmly but quickly walk to the door and come out to us!
Bang!  You're dead, Tweek.
